engChrName: There's still no sign of any people or monsters.
engSearchText: There's still no sign of any people or monsters.
jpnChrName: 半グレ、魔獣などの気配無し。
jpnSearchText: 半グレ、魔獣などの気配無し。

engChrName: Well, I don't know about you, but I'm getting bored of just running, so how about you get to spilling?
engSearchText:
Well, I don't know about you, but I'm getting bored
of just running, so how about you get to spilling?
jpnChrName: ハッ、ただ抜けるっつーのもダルいし 丁度いいから話してもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、ただ抜けるっつーのもダルいし
丁度いいから話してもらおうか？

engChrName: Time to tell us about Van, buddy.
engSearchText: Time to tell us about Van, buddy.
jpnChrName: ヴァンの野郎のセキララ情報をよ。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンの野郎のセキララ情報をよ。

engChrName: A-Aaron...
engSearchText: A-Aaron...
jpnChrName: ア、アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: ア、アーロンさん……

engChrName: Yeah! I wanna know, too!
engSearchText: Yeah! I wanna know, too!
jpnChrName: いいですねっ。 わたしも聞きたいです！
jpnSearchText:
いいですねっ。
わたしも聞きたいです！

engChrName: Heh. I can only tell you about the times when we were together, though.
engSearchText:
Heh. I can only tell you about the times when we
were together, though.
jpnChrName: フッ……といっても私が知るのは ヤツと接点があった時期だけだが。
jpnSearchText:
フッ……といっても私が知るのは
ヤツと接点があった時期だけだが。

engChrName: I believe you've already heard about his time in Oración...which just leaves our time at Aramis.
engSearchText:
I believe you've already heard about his time in
Oración...which just leaves our time at Aramis.
jpnChrName: オラシオンでの話は聞いたようだし── となるとアラミスの在学期間あたりか？
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンでの話は聞いたようだし──
となるとアラミスの在学期間あたりか？

engChrName: ...! (I really want to know, but still...)
engSearchText:
...!
(I really want to know, but still...)
jpnChrName: ……！ （凄く知りたいですけど……）
jpnSearchText:
……！
（凄く知りたいですけど……）

engChrName: Yes, please!
engSearchText: Yes, please!
jpnChrName: ぜひお願いしますっ。
jpnSearchText: ぜひお願いしますっ。

engChrName: We wanna hear all the sordid deets between him and Auclair, too.
engSearchText:
We wanna hear all the sordid deets between him and
Auclair, too.
jpnChrName: ヤツとオークレールとの関係とかも みっちりねっちり頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツとオークレールとの関係とかも
みっちりねっちり頼むぜ。

engChrName: G-Guys, we really shouldn't...
engSearchText: G-Guys, we really shouldn't...
jpnChrName: も、もう２人とも……！
jpnSearchText: も、もう２人とも……！

engChrName: Hmm... If you'd rather not be involved, we can run a bit ahead of you.
engSearchText:
Hmm... If you'd rather not be involved, we can run a
bit ahead of you.
jpnChrName: ふむ、聞きたくないのであれば 少しばかり先行しようか。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、聞きたくないのであれば
少しばかり先行しようか。

engChrName: W-Wai—
engSearchText: W-Wai—
jpnChrName: え、ええっ……？
jpnSearchText: え、ええっ……？

engChrName: Heh. Yeah, I thought so.
engSearchText: Heh. Yeah, I thought so.
jpnChrName: クク、そりゃそうだよなァ？
jpnSearchText: クク、そりゃそうだよなァ？

engChrName: Heehee. The more, the merrier!
engSearchText: Heehee. The more, the merrier!
jpnChrName: えへへ、旅は道連れですっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、旅は道連れですっ。

engChrName: All right, then...
engSearchText: All right, then...
jpnChrName: フッ…… では、改めてになるが──
jpnSearchText:
フッ……
では、改めてになるが──

engChrName: *sigh* Why do I get the feelin' René's tellin' 'em about my personal life as we speak?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Why do I get the feelin' René's tellin' 'em
about my personal life as we speak?
jpnChrName: っ……何だかルネの野郎が 余計なことを話してる気がするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
っ……何だかルネの野郎が
余計なことを話してる気がするぜ。

engChrName: Well, he DID say he was going to...
engSearchText: Well, he DID say he was going to...
jpnChrName: ま、あの様子だとそうかもね。
jpnSearchText: ま、あの様子だとそうかもね。

engChrName: And here we are missing out on the fun. So come on—out with it!
engSearchText:
And here we are missing out on the fun. So come
on—out with it!
jpnChrName: ていうか向こうだけズルイじゃない。 観念してこっちにも教えなさいよ。
jpnSearchText:
ていうか向こうだけズルイじゃない。
観念してこっちにも教えなさいよ。

engChrName: Out with what?!
engSearchText: Out with what?!
jpnChrName: だから何をだよ！？
jpnSearchText: だから何をだよ！？

engChrName: We want to hear everything that happened while you were at Aramis, of course!
engSearchText:
We want to hear everything that happened while you
were at Aramis, of course!
jpnChrName: そりゃあ、名門アラミスに 在学してた頃の話じゃないの？
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ、名門アラミスに
在学してた頃の話じゃないの？

engChrName: Yeah. It sure feels to me like you were going out with Beauty's Blade while you were there...
engSearchText:
Yeah. It sure feels to me like you were going out with
Beauty's Blade while you were there...
jpnChrName: そうね、あの剣の乙女サンと 付き合ってたっぽい感じだし。
jpnSearchText:
そうね、あの剣の乙女サンと
付き合ってたっぽい感じだし。

engChrName: Urgh...
engSearchText: Urgh...
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: It isn't proper to pry into another's affairs, you two.
engSearchText: It isn't proper to pry into another's affairs, you two.
jpnChrName: まあまあ、お二人とも。
jpnSearchText: まあまあ、お二人とも。

engChrName: Oh, but what an incredible coincidence it was that you happened to meet your friends again while at Aramis, hmm?
engSearchText:
Oh, but what an incredible coincidence it was that
you happened to meet your friends again while at
Aramis, hmm?
jpnChrName: ですがエレイン様とキンケイド様とは 入学時に偶然の再会だったとか？
jpnSearchText:
ですがエレイン様とキンケイド様とは
入学時に偶然の再会だったとか？

engChrName: You're just as bad as the rest of them!
engSearchText: You're just as bad as the rest of them!
jpnChrName: ってお前さんも 聞く気満々じゃねーか！？
jpnSearchText:
ってお前さんも
聞く気満々じゃねーか！？

engChrName: Though it's not like I'm that desperate to hide it or anything.
engSearchText:
Though it's not like I'm that desperate to hide it
or anything.
jpnChrName: ま、別に隠すほどのモンでもねぇか……
jpnSearchText: ま、別に隠すほどのモンでもねぇか……

engChrName: So, you know all about me growin' up in an orphanage in Oración...
engSearchText:
So, you know all about me growin' up in an
orphanage in Oración...
jpnChrName: ──俺がオラシオンの孤児院で 厄介になってたのは知っての通りだが。
jpnSearchText:
──俺がオラシオンの孤児院で
厄介になってたのは知っての通りだが。

engChrName: ...but after that, I ended up in the custody of another place.
engSearchText:
...but after that, I ended up in the custody of
another place.
jpnChrName: その後、ある所に引き取られて、 ちょいとばかり色々あったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
その後、ある所に引き取られて、
ちょいとばかり色々あったんだ。

engChrName: A lot happened after that to say the least, both good and bad.
engSearchText:
A lot happened after that to say the least, both good
and bad.
jpnChrName: 色々あった…… ……良いことも、悪いことも。
jpnSearchText:
色々あった……
……良いことも、悪いことも。

engChrName: Then things changed again when I was fourteen, and I ended up somewhere else.
engSearchText:
Then things changed again when I was fourteen, and
I ended up somewhere else.
jpnChrName: だが１４の時に転機があって、 ……また別の筋に引き取られて……
jpnSearchText:
だが１４の時に転機があって、
……また別の筋に引き取られて……

engChrName: That was when someone suggested I take the entrance exam for Aramis.
engSearchText:
That was when someone suggested I take the
entrance exam for Aramis.
jpnChrName: そこで勧められて受けてみたのが アラミスの入学試験だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そこで勧められて受けてみたのが
アラミスの入学試験だったんだ。

engChrName: And that was where we met again for the first time in seven years.
engSearchText:
And that was where we met again for the first time in
seven years.
jpnChrName: そして俺たちは７年ぶりに再会した。
jpnSearchText: そして俺たちは７年ぶりに再会した。

engChrName: I had no idea what they'd been up to all that time, and they knew just as little about me.
engSearchText:
I had no idea what they'd been up to all that time,
and they knew just as little about me.
jpnChrName: エレインにしてもルネにしても 互いの近況を全く知らないまま……
jpnSearchText:
エレインにしてもルネにしても
互いの近況を全く知らないまま……

engChrName: There are just some people you can't get away from though, I guess.
engSearchText:
There are just some people you can't get away from
though, I guess.
jpnChrName: ──ま、こういうのを まさに腐れ縁って言うんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、こういうのを
まさに腐れ縁って言うんだろうな。

engChrName: Still, while neither of us knew exactly what happened to him...
engSearchText:
Still, while neither of us knew exactly what
happened to him...
jpnChrName: オラシオンで別れてからの７年、 あいつが何をしていたのか……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンで別れてからの７年、
あいつが何をしていたのか……

engChrName: ...we could tell something had.
engSearchText: ...we could tell something had.
jpnChrName: 私もエレインも分からなかったが “何か”があったのは想像ついた。
jpnSearchText:
私もエレインも分からなかったが
“何か”があったのは想像ついた。

engChrName: We didn't try to push the matter. Instead, we rejoiced in our reunion and rekindled our old bonds.
engSearchText:
We didn't try to push the matter. Instead, we rejoiced
in our reunion and rekindled our old bonds.
jpnChrName: ──だがあえて踏み込まず、 再会を喜び、旧交を温めていった。
jpnSearchText:
──だがあえて踏み込まず、
再会を喜び、旧交を温めていった。

engChrName: Much happened during our time together, including the school festival in late April and the Student Council president election...
engSearchText:
Much happened during our time together, including
the school festival in late April and the Student
Council president election...
jpnChrName: ４月後半にある学藝祭や、 私自身が出馬した生徒会長選挙──
jpnSearchText:
４月後半にある学藝祭や、
私自身が出馬した生徒会長選挙──

engChrName: ...and through it all, we quickly went back to being as close as we were before.
engSearchText:
...and through it all, we quickly went back to being as
close as we were before.
jpnChrName: それらを通じて、幼い頃に戻ったような 気の置けない仲となり……
jpnSearchText:
それらを通じて、幼い頃に戻ったような
気の置けない仲となり……

engChrName: When I became Student Council president, the two of them even helped me with my work.
engSearchText:
When I became Student Council president, the two
of them even helped me with my work.
jpnChrName: ヴァンとエレインは私の生徒会業務を 手伝うようにもなっていった。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンとエレインは私の生徒会業務を
手伝うようにもなっていった。

engChrName: Still, not everything could be the same as it was in the old days.
engSearchText:
Still, not everything could be the same as it was in the
old days.
jpnChrName: ──だが当然、 幼い頃のままではいられない。
jpnSearchText:
──だが当然、
幼い頃のままではいられない。

engChrName: It didn't take long for Van and Elaine to realize their attraction to one another...
engSearchText:
It didn't take long for Van and Elaine to realize their
attraction to one another...
jpnChrName: ヴァンとエレインはごく自然に、 互いのことを意識するようになり……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンとエレインはごく自然に、
互いのことを意識するようになり……

engChrName: ...and, during late autumn, the two of them confessed to each other and started dating.
engSearchText:
...and, during late autumn, the two of them confessed
to each other and started dating.
jpnChrName: 秋が深まる頃には想いを伝え合って 付き合うことになった。
jpnSearchText:
秋が深まる頃には想いを伝え合って
付き合うことになった。

engChrName: Having suspected how they felt towards one another since our childhood, the only surprise for me was that it took so long.
engSearchText:
Having suspected how they felt towards one another
since our childhood, the only surprise for me was that
it took so long.
jpnChrName: 幼い頃から２人の淡い気持ちを察していた 私には、やっとかという気分だったが……
jpnSearchText:
幼い頃から２人の淡い気持ちを察していた
私には、やっとかという気分だったが……

engChrName: Still, while it made me happy to see the two of them come together, I couldn't help but feel a little lonely to see them pair off without me.
engSearchText:
Still, while it made me happy to see the two of them
come together, I couldn't help but feel a little lonely
to see them pair off without me.
jpnChrName: それでも弟分と妹分がくっついたことは 寂しくも嬉しい不思議な気分だったものだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも弟分と妹分がくっついたことは
寂しくも嬉しい不思議な気分だったものだ。

engChrName: ...Did I have feelings for her? No, not at all.
engSearchText: ...Did I have feelings for her? No, not at all.
jpnChrName: ──私がエレインのことを？ いや、特にそれはなかったな。
jpnSearchText:
──私がエレインのことを？
いや、特にそれはなかったな。

engChrName: I had a girlfriend of my own at the time, and all in all, I was quite satisfied with my personal life.
engSearchText:
I had a girlfriend of my own at the time, and all in all,
I was quite satisfied with my personal life.
jpnChrName: 当時も付き合っていた彼女がいたし…… リア充？　そう言えなくもないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
当時も付き合っていた彼女がいたし……
リア充？　そう言えなくもないだろう。

engChrName: Still, it was like most relationships at that age. It was never gonna last—it was over and done in half a year.
engSearchText:
Still, it was like most relationships at that age. It was
never gonna last—it was over and done in half a year.
jpnChrName: つっても学生時代の淡い恋愛…… 半年しか続かなかったオママゴトだ。
jpnSearchText:
つっても学生時代の淡い恋愛……
半年しか続かなかったオママゴトだ。

engChrName: I think we'd just gotten carried away 'cause we were so happy to be together again.
engSearchText:
I think we'd just gotten carried away 'cause we were
so happy to be together again.
jpnChrName: 俺にしてもエレインにしても、再会の偶然と 嬉しさに舞い上がってたのも大きいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
俺にしてもエレインにしても、再会の偶然と
嬉しさに舞い上がってたのも大きいだろう。

engChrName: I wasn't the only one with stuff going on, either. I could tell she had trouble with her family even then.
engSearchText:
I wasn't the only one with stuff going on, either.
I could tell she had trouble with her family even then.
jpnChrName: 俺は俺で色々あったが──エレインも 当時から実家のことで悩んでいたからな。
jpnSearchText:
俺は俺で色々あったが──エレインも
当時から実家のことで悩んでいたからな。

engChrName: But that's how relationships are. We probably could've taken it further—it just didn't work out that way.
engSearchText:
But that's how relationships are. We probably
could've taken it further—it just didn't work out
that way.
jpnChrName: ただ、恋愛なんてそんなモンだ。 そこから育む未来もあったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、恋愛なんてそんなモンだ。
そこから育む未来もあったんだろう。

engChrName: After that, we were both focused on the school festival as second years. And by that, I mean we were busy as hell.
engSearchText:
After that, we were both focused on the school
festival as second years. And by that, I mean we were
busy as hell.
jpnChrName: ……２年最初の学藝祭に向けては 本当に充実していた。
jpnSearchText:
……２年最初の学藝祭に向けては
本当に充実していた。

engChrName: Preparations revolved around René as president, Elaine as vice president, and me workin' behind the scenes.
engSearchText:
Preparations revolved around René as president,
Elaine as vice president, and me workin' behind
the scenes.
jpnChrName: 会長のルネと、１年で副会長になったエレインと 裏方を一手に引き受けた俺を中心に団結して……
jpnSearchText:
会長のルネと、１年で副会長になったエレインと
裏方を一手に引き受けた俺を中心に団結して……

engChrName: We filled the whole thing with surprises. The performance at the end was some real unprecedented stuff.
engSearchText:
We filled the whole thing with surprises.
The performance at the end was some real
unprecedented stuff.
jpnChrName: 例年にないゲリライベントも企画して 締めの舞台は前代未聞の演出も狙った。
jpnSearchText:
例年にないゲリライベントも企画して
締めの舞台は前代未聞の演出も狙った。

engChrName: The school principal may've been less than pleased by it all, but lookin' back, it was still a fond memory for me.
engSearchText:
The school principal may've been less than pleased by
it all, but lookin' back, it was still a fond memory
for me.
jpnChrName: 教頭あたりには睨まれちまったが…… それもまた良い思い出になったモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
教頭あたりには睨まれちまったが……
それもまた良い思い出になったモンだ。

engChrName: You wouldn't believe how cute Elaine was then, or how much like an older brother René was with the way he looked out for us.
engSearchText:
You wouldn't believe how cute Elaine was then, or
how much like an older brother René was with the
way he looked out for us.
jpnChrName: 何より当時のエレインは最高に可愛かったし、 ルネも良い兄貴分として見守ってくれていた。
jpnSearchText:
何より当時のエレインは最高に可愛かったし、
ルネも良い兄貴分として見守ってくれていた。

engChrName: But I...
engSearchText: But I...
jpnChrName: ………なのに、俺は───
jpnSearchText: ………なのに、俺は───

engChrName: But not long after, everything came to an abrupt end.
engSearchText: But not long after, everything came to an abrupt end.
jpnChrName: そんな日々は唐突に終わりを告げた。
jpnSearchText: そんな日々は唐突に終わりを告げた。

engChrName: The next Student Council election was held in May, and Elaine became its next president.
engSearchText:
The next Student Council election was held in May,
and Elaine became its next president.
jpnChrName: 学藝祭が終わった５月、生徒会選挙で エレインが順当に生徒会長となった後──
jpnSearchText:
学藝祭が終わった５月、生徒会選挙で
エレインが順当に生徒会長となった後──

engChrName: Everyone, including us, expected that Van would go on to become her vice president...but it was not to be.
engSearchText:
Everyone, including us, expected that Van would go
on to become her vice president...but it was not to be.
jpnChrName: 私たちを含めた皆が、ヴァンが副会長を 引き受けると思い込んでいた矢先の事だった。
jpnSearchText:
私たちを含めた皆が、ヴァンが副会長を
引き受けると思い込んでいた矢先の事だった。

engChrName: All the letter he left to me said was, 'Sorry. Take care of Elaine for me.'
engSearchText:
All the letter he left to me said was, 'Sorry. Take care
of Elaine for me.'
jpnChrName: 私に宛てた手紙にあったのは 『悪い、エレインを頼む』の一文のみ。
jpnSearchText:
私に宛てた手紙にあったのは
『悪い、エレインを頼む』の一文のみ。

engChrName: While the one he left for Elaine contained a clumsily written apology.
engSearchText:
While the one he left for Elaine contained a clumsily
written apology.
jpnChrName: エレインに宛てた手紙には さすがに不器用な謝罪が綴られていた。
jpnSearchText:
エレインに宛てた手紙には
さすがに不器用な謝罪が綴られていた。

engChrName: Neither of us were told anything about the reason behind his actions.
engSearchText:
Neither of us were told anything about the reason
behind his actions.
jpnChrName: だが──肝心の理由については 結局のところ何一つ書かれていなかった。
jpnSearchText:
だが──肝心の理由については
結局のところ何一つ書かれていなかった。

engChrName: And that's how second-year student Van Arkride dropped out before he could graduate.
engSearchText:
And that's how second-year student Van Arkride
dropped out before he could graduate.
jpnChrName: こうして、アラミス高等学校２年生、 ヴァン・アークライドは中退したわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
こうして、アラミス高等学校２年生、
ヴァン・アークライドは中退したわけだ。

engChrName: That was seven years ago now—well, seven and a half if you wanna get nitpicky about it.
engSearchText:
That was seven years ago now—well, seven and a half
if you wanna get nitpicky about it.
jpnChrName: ７年──いや７年半前の話だな。
jpnSearchText: ７年──いや７年半前の話だな。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: Why did you...? No, never mind.
engSearchText: Why did you...? No, never mind.
jpnChrName: どうしてそんな…… ──ううん、何でもないわ。
jpnSearchText:
どうしてそんな……
──ううん、何でもないわ。

engChrName: There were a bunch of reasons why I dropped out, but one was that I just wasn't cut out for that life to begin with.
engSearchText:
There were a bunch of reasons why I dropped out,
but one was that I just wasn't cut out for that life to
begin with.
jpnChrName: ま、辞めちまった理由は色々だが 一つには向いてなかったんだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、辞めちまった理由は色々だが
一つには向いてなかったんだろうな。

engChrName: Sure, you guys already know I'm not great in groups or at being a part of somethin'.
engSearchText:
Sure, you guys already know I'm not great in groups
or at being a part of somethin'.
jpnChrName: 知っての通り、群れたり何かに 属するのが苦手っつう性分でもある。
jpnSearchText:
知っての通り、群れたり何かに
属するのが苦手っつう性分でもある。

engChrName: Aaron's got a bit of that in him, too, so I'm really hopin' he doesn't end up like me.
engSearchText:
Aaron's got a bit of that in him, too, so I'm really
hopin' he doesn't end up like me.
jpnChrName: ああ、アーロンなんかもその気はあるから 俺みたいにならねぇといいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アーロンなんかもその気はあるから
俺みたいにならねぇといいんだが。

engChrName: ...I don't think you need to worry about him.
engSearchText: ...I don't think you need to worry about him.
jpnChrName: あはは……アーロンさんは 心配するだけムダだと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……アーロンさんは
心配するだけムダだと思うけど。

engChrName: Still, are you sure you're really as bad with groups as you're saying?
engSearchText:
Still, are you sure you're really as bad with groups as
you're saying?
jpnChrName: でもヴァンさん──群れたりするのが 苦手っていうのは苦しいんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
でもヴァンさん──群れたりするのが
苦手っていうのは苦しいんじゃない？

engChrName: ...Huh?
engSearchText: ...Huh?
jpnChrName: へ。
jpnSearchText: へ。

engChrName: B-But why would he just drop out like that?
engSearchText: B-But why would he just drop out like that?
jpnChrName: で、でもどうして いきなり学校を……？
jpnSearchText:
で、でもどうして
いきなり学校を……？

engChrName: Sure there's some reason, but no doubt he'd rather take it to the grave than tell us.
engSearchText:
Sure there's some reason, but no doubt he'd rather
take it to the grave than tell us.
jpnChrName: ハッ、何かあんだろうが、 あの野郎なら墓まで持ってきそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、何かあんだろうが、
あの野郎なら墓まで持ってきそうだな。

engChrName: Judging by that crap he was spewing this morning.
engSearchText: Judging by that crap he was spewing this morning.
jpnChrName: 朝みたいなタワゴトを言い出すようじゃ。
jpnSearchText: 朝みたいなタワゴトを言い出すようじゃ。

engChrName: Oh, right...
engSearchText: Oh, right...

engChrName: Van is going to be just fine.
engSearchText: Van is going to be just fine.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですよ、フェリちゃん。 アーロンさんに、キンケイドさんも。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫ですよ、フェリちゃん。
アーロンさんに、キンケイドさんも。
え……

engChrName: Hmm?
engSearchText: Hmm?
jpnChrName: あん……？
jpnSearchText: あん……？

engChrName: I believe the reason he said what he did this morning is the opposite: because he's facing us head on.
engSearchText:
I believe the reason he said what he did this morning
is the opposite: because he's facing us head on.
jpnChrName: あんなことを言い出したのは逆に 私たちに向き合っているからだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
あんなことを言い出したのは逆に
私たちに向き合っているからだと思います。

engChrName: He's not trying to change the subject or gloss over how he's feeling—he's giving us a clear sign that something's wrong.
engSearchText:
He's not trying to change the subject or gloss over
how he's feeling—he's giving us a clear sign that
something's wrong.
jpnChrName: 誤魔化したり、有耶無耶にしたりしないで 何かあるってちゃんとサインをくれて……
jpnSearchText:
誤魔化したり、有耶無耶にしたりしないで
何かあるってちゃんとサインをくれて……

engChrName: We all know how he is. He's cunning but kind, and more dependable than anyone...and deep down, a little timid, too.
engSearchText:
We all know how he is. He's cunning but kind, and
more dependable than anyone...and deep down, a
little timid, too.
jpnChrName: ──優しくてちょっとズルくて 誰よりも頼もしいけど、少し臆病な人。
jpnSearchText:
──優しくてちょっとズルくて
誰よりも頼もしいけど、少し臆病な人。

engChrName: That's why I'm not worried about him. He's going to be just fine.
engSearchText:
That's why I'm not worried about him. He's going to
be just fine.
jpnChrName: だから私、あまり心配していないんです。
jpnSearchText: だから私、あまり心配していないんです。

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...

jpnSearchText: ……………………………

engChrName: You have been doing a fine job as the chief of Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
You have been doing a fine job as the chief of
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 今のヴァン様は解決事務所の長として 十分に弁えていらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
今のヴァン様は解決事務所の長として
十分に弁えていらっしゃいます。

engChrName: It seems to come to you naturally, too, as does your consideration for all of us.
engSearchText:
It seems to come to you naturally, too, as does your
consideration for all of us.
jpnChrName: 特に無理もせず、ごく自然な配慮で。
jpnSearchText: 特に無理もせず、ごく自然な配慮で。

engChrName: Yeah. You've always been good at looking out for others. I mean, look at how understanding you've been of my situation.
engSearchText:
Yeah. You've always been good at looking out
for others. I mean, look at how understanding you've
been of my situation.
jpnChrName: そうね……何だかんだ面倒見いいし、 あたしの事情にも付き合ってくれるし。
jpnSearchText:
そうね……何だかんだ面倒見いいし、
あたしの事情にも付き合ってくれるし。

engChrName: I don't think Elaine and Kincaid are going to be satisfied with that explanation—or the others in the office, for that matter.
engSearchText:
I don't think Elaine and Kincaid are going to be
satisfied with that explanation—or the others in the
office, for that matter.
jpnChrName: そんな説明じゃエレインさん達も アニエスたちも納得しないんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
そんな説明じゃエレインさん達も
アニエスたちも納得しないんじゃない？
っ……

engChrName: I believe the time will eventually come for you to stop running and face everyone.
engSearchText:
I believe the time will eventually come for you to stop
running and face everyone.
jpnChrName: ……いずれはヴァン様が 向き合う必要があると存じます。
jpnSearchText:
……いずれはヴァン様が
向き合う必要があると存じます。

engChrName: Not just us, but your friends, your master, the people you live with...
engSearchText:
Not just us, but your friends, your master, the people
you live with...
jpnChrName: アニエス様たちに、エレイン様たち。 ベルガルド様に、ビストロのご一家……
jpnSearchText:
アニエス様たちに、エレイン様たち。
ベルガルド様に、ビストロのご一家……

engChrName: There are so many people who care deeply for you. I count myself among them.
engSearchText:
There are so many people who care deeply for you.
I count myself among them.
jpnChrName: 貴方を大切に思っている全ての方々に。 ──わたくしもその一人ではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
貴方を大切に思っている全ての方々に。
──わたくしもその一人ではありますが。

engChrName: It's honestly hard to watch you sometimes and not say anything.
engSearchText:
It's honestly hard to watch you sometimes and not
say anything.
jpnChrName: 言っとくけど僕たちだって ツッコみたいのは山々なんだからね？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくけど僕たちだって
ツッコみたいのは山々なんだからね？

engChrName: But at the end of the day, the responsibility falls to you before anyone else, and you need to be aware of that.
engSearchText:
But at the end of the day, the responsibility falls to
you before anyone else, and you need to be aware
of that.
jpnChrName: でも優先順位ってあるじゃない。 その辺はしっかりして欲しいかな。
jpnSearchText:
でも優先順位ってあるじゃない。
その辺はしっかりして欲しいかな。

engChrName: ...Good grief.
engSearchText: ...Good grief.
jpnSearchText: …………ったく。

engChrName: I feel like I can hear everyone on René's side sayin' the same damn things.
engSearchText:
I feel like I can hear everyone on René's side sayin'
the same damn things.
jpnChrName: なんか向こうでも似たようなことを 言われてそうな気もするが……
jpnSearchText:
なんか向こうでも似たようなことを
言われてそうな気もするが……

engChrName: I'll settle this with myself eventually. If for nothin' else but to make me look cool.
engSearchText:
I'll settle this with myself eventually. If for nothin'
else but to make me look cool.
jpnChrName: ──どこかでケジメは付けるぜ。 てめえ自身に格好つけるためにもな。
jpnSearchText:
──どこかでケジメは付けるぜ。
てめえ自身に格好つけるためにもな。

engChrName: Haha. That sounds like a good start to me.
engSearchText: Haha. That sounds like a good start to me.
jpnChrName: フフ…… まずはそれでいいんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
まずはそれでいいんじゃない？

engChrName: You DO like to act cool, after all.
engSearchText: You DO like to act cool, after all.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、格好つけだもんね。
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、格好つけだもんね。

engChrName: We would all like to do what we can to help you when that time comes.
engSearchText:
We would all like to do what we can to help you
when that time comes.
jpnChrName: 及ばずながらわたくし達にも お力添えさせて頂けると。
jpnSearchText:
及ばずながらわたくし達にも
お力添えさせて頂けると。

engChrName: Heh. Perhaps he's finally losing his touch...
engSearchText: Heh. Perhaps he's finally losing his touch...
jpnChrName: フッ、ヴァンのヤツも そろそろ焼きが回って──
jpnSearchText:
フッ、ヴァンのヤツも
そろそろ焼きが回って──

engChrName: ...or more like it's time for him to finally pay the piper.
engSearchText:
...or more like it's time for him to finally pay
the piper.
jpnChrName: いや、年貢の納め時かもしれんな。
jpnSearchText: いや、年貢の納め時かもしれんな。

engChrName: Damn. He's fighting a losing battle if even a schoolgirl can see through his act now.
engSearchText:
Damn. He's fighting a losing battle if even a
schoolgirl can see through his act now.
jpnChrName: クク、こんな小娘に 見透かされてるくらいだからなァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、こんな小娘に
見透かされてるくらいだからなァ。

engChrName: Feels like he's putting a pointlessly long abeyance on the inevitable while he tries to find himself to me, if I'm being real with you.
engSearchText:
Feels like he's putting a pointlessly long abeyance on
the inevitable while he tries to find himself to me, if
I'm being real with you.
jpnChrName: つーか自分捜しのモラトリアムを 続けてるようにしか見えねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
つーか自分捜しのモラトリアムを
続けてるようにしか見えねえぜ。

engChrName: Hmm... I could see the 'finding himself' angle, yeah.
engSearchText: Hmm... I could see the 'finding himself' angle, yeah.
jpnChrName: 自分捜し……ああ、 確かにそんな所はありますよね。
jpnSearchText:
自分捜し……ああ、
確かにそんな所はありますよね。

engChrName: No idea what an 'abeyance' is, though...
engSearchText: No idea what an 'abeyance' is, though...
jpnChrName: もらとりあむっていうのが 何なのかは分かりませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
もらとりあむっていうのが
何なのかは分かりませんけど。

engChrName: Ahaha... I'm not sure it's quite that simple.
engSearchText: Ahaha... I'm not sure it's quite that simple.
jpnChrName: あはは……流石にもうちょっと 色々あるんだと思いますけど。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……流石にもうちょっと
色々あるんだと思いますけど。

engChrName: Still, I believe in him. I know he'll stop averting his eyes one day.
engSearchText:
Still, I believe in him. I know he'll stop averting his
eyes one day.
jpnChrName: でも──信じています。 ちゃんと向き合ってくれるって。
jpnSearchText:
でも──信じています。
ちゃんと向き合ってくれるって。

engChrName: Not from us so much as from himself.
engSearchText: Not from us so much as from himself.
jpnChrName: 私たちに対してというより、 他ならぬ、ヴァンさん自身に対して。
jpnSearchText:
私たちに対してというより、
他ならぬ、ヴァンさん自身に対して。

engChrName: Agnès...
engSearchText: Agnès...
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……

engChrName: Ha! Listen to this girl.
engSearchText: Ha! Listen to this girl.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 小娘がナマ言いやがって。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
小娘がナマ言いやがって。

engChrName: It's that kind of straightforward honesty that has the greatest effect on him, I think.
engSearchText:
It's that kind of straightforward honesty that has the
greatest effect on him, I think.
jpnChrName: フフ、だがヤツには 何より効く言葉かもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、だがヤツには
何より効く言葉かもしれんな。

engChrName: (Perhaps if I'd been able to say the same to him seven years ago... No. There's no use in dwelling on the past.)
engSearchText:
(Perhaps if I'd been able to say the same to him seven
years ago... No. There's no use in dwelling on
the past.)
jpnChrName: （……７年前に同じことが   言えていたら──いや、繰言か。）
jpnSearchText:
（……７年前に同じことが
言えていたら──いや、繰言か。）

engChrName: We're almost at the end of the corridor. Get ready, team.
engSearchText:
We're almost at the end of the corridor. Get
ready, team.
jpnChrName: 連絡通路も終わりだ── そろそろ引き締めるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
連絡通路も終わりだ──
そろそろ引き締めるとしよう。

engChrName: Now that we've come this far, I'm determined to make it to the end before he does.
engSearchText:
Now that we've come this far, I'm determined to
make it to the end before he does.
jpnChrName: ここまで来たら何としても ヤツより先に辿り着かなくてはな。
jpnSearchText:
ここまで来たら何としても
ヤツより先に辿り着かなくてはな。

engChrName: Then let's get a move on!
engSearchText: Then let's get a move on!
jpnChrName: 乗ったぜ！
jpnSearchText: 乗ったぜ！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）っ！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）っ！

engChrName: *sigh* This isn't a race, you know...
engSearchText: *sigh* This isn't a race, you know...
jpnChrName: もう…… 別に勝負じゃないんですから。
jpnSearchText:
もう……
別に勝負じゃないんですから。

engChrName: (...Even if I admittedly do want to see everyone's faces again as soon as possible.)
engSearchText:
(...Even if I admittedly do want to see everyone's
faces again as soon as possible.)
jpnChrName: （でも会いたいな……   早くヴァンさんたちに。）
jpnSearchText:
（でも会いたいな……
早くヴァンさんたちに。）
